title: I would just like to point out

embed.description: To say Azir has been a balance minefield would be an understatement. Shurima's Emperor has been caught in a game of tug-of-war between his difficulty for new players and how overbearing he can be in the hands of experienced players.

body:
> As well, his persistent teamfight control is too high for how much consistent teamfight damage he has. Using his ultimate creatively to start a fight, or knock somebody back as they dive in is awesome. Putting it up and leaving it there so nobody can get on him for 3 seconds? Not so much.


 _'Persistant teamfight control'_
_'Consistant teamfight damage'_
_'Putting it up and leaving it there, so no one can get on him'_

All I see when I read this is: _"Yasuo nerfs."_

replies.body:
Yes please. Just nerf the damn windwall slightly so it doesn't block everything and the kitchen sink and problem solved

Or at least make it consistent with what it blocks. Some of the stuff it can stop makes no damn sense
